entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 21 at 2:14PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...More Snow For the Interior Wednesday Night... Another weather front will move into the Interior Wednesday evening, with snow reaching the Fairbanks area by Wednesday night. entry.cap:areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 10:41PM PST until December 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...MULTIPLE ROUNDS OF MOUNTAIN SNOW EXPECTED INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK... .The next round of precipitation will arrive by Wednesday afternoon and evening. Snow levels on Wednesday will generally be near or above 4000 feet. However, colder air will spread across the region Friday, with snow levels around 2500 to 3000 feet. Even lower snow levels along with additional precipitation is expected

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 12:10AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...POCKETS OF FREEZING RAIN POSSIBLE PRIOR TO DAYBREAK... Rain will overspread Litchfield County this morning. Precipitation may begin briefly as sleet and then quickly change to a mixture of light sleet, rain and some pockets of freezing rain.

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued December 21 at 8:25AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...AN AIR QUALITY ADVISORY HAS BEEN ISSUED BY THE IDAHO DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL QUALITY... Due to elevated pollutant levels and stagnant conditions, the air quality is expected to become unhealthy for sensitive groups in Franklin County including the city of Preston. This advisory will remain in effect until air quality has significantly improved.
